Who: RODIMUS PRIME, Perceptor

> "It's good to know it"said the male"but st=
ill you have to learn a lot a bout
> intriges... Does Darkhawk have a reaso=
n to hates you? Have you done
> something to him?"

As Perceptor spoke Rodi=
mus barely heard him. It was as if inside his head voices were talking. The=
 word faliure echoing through his systems. Some voices seemed to be whisper=
ing into his ears while others were yelling at the top of thier lungs. Some=
 where reminding him of his failure - his failure to protect Nightlight, hi=
s failure to defeat Cyclonus, and his failure to keep the power of the matr=
ix. 

Yet despite all of that, he could now hear voices of hope, of redempt=
ion, of a returning to his former glory!

"I will not allow anyone to come =
to harm because of my own failure!" Rodims said again, but this time he con=
tinued, "Because I will no longer allow my failure to consume me!!" 

It wa=
s a profound statement of some internal conviction he felt. Meanwhile some =
internal warmth stealed over his internal systems, as the fire that had bee=
n cold and black for so long was now burning a bright firey red as a power =
that he had almost forgotten about once again flooded him. 

When Rodimus l=
ooked back at Perceptor again, it was not through the crimson optics of a D=
ecepticon or Predacon, but the clear yellow ones of an Autobot, one that ha=
d once been given the task to lead the Autobots through thier darkest hour,=
 only to be consumed by it, but now through the hope and efforts of others =
had risen once again. 

With a swift movement the reborn RODIMUS PRIME atte=
mpted to shove Perceptor back. Then without out even looking to see if he h=
ad been successful he leaped over to the cell block control panel and enter=
ed the command that would open all the cells and release the prisoners!

"R=
ISE AUTOBOTS AND MAXIMALS!" Rodimus said both out loud and over the Maximal=
 and Autobot frequencies, "THE TIME HAS COME TO FIGHT FOR OUR FREEDOM! ARIS=
E!"

OOC: Airly, its up to you how successful that was :)

(TAG)

Preston
